tribes.capabilitiesNarrative: KAIA Inc. delivers mission-ready visualization that supports faster decisions, improves operator performance, and reduces uncertainty. We serve programs across defense, aerospace, and energy by transforming complex technical systems into intuitive visuals—digital twins, interactive walkthroughs, user interfaces, and mission-aligned tools. Our Emmy-winning team has over 30 years of experience supporting federal clients including FAA, DHS, and BLM. We help agencies communicate with clarity, streamline operations, and minimize risk through targeted visual assets. From stakeholder briefings to engineering support, KAIA builds tools that increase comprehension before systems go live. Our visuals accelerate onboarding, reduce delays, and support high-performance execution. KAIA combines operational insight with design expertise to deliver clear, actionable media that aligns with mission needs and enhances overall readiness.

tribes.capabilitiesNarrative: Bering-Weston is a Joint Venture between Bering Straits Global Innovations, LLC (BSGI), an 8(a) certified company, and Weston Solutions, Inc. (Weston), a full-service engineering and construction firm. Our partnership builds upon multiple projects performed together under prime/sub relationships and long-term, legacy working relationships between a number of our key personnel, and decades of experience working with the Department of Defense (DoD) supporting military and civil construction programs and environmental restoration programs. For 25+ years, Weston has been providing clients with unparalleled support of all phases of design-build contracts, attending pre-construction conferences, reviewing contractor submittals/RFIs, providing QA/QC reviews of contractor submittals, and preparing value engineering proposals. Since 2015 Weston has been awarded 2,400+ projects valued at over $2.5B dollars of engineering and construction services to government and commercial industry clients.

Bowhead Cybersecurity Solutions & Services, LLC (BCSS) is an Alaskan Native 8(a) Small Disadvantaged Business that provides IT and Cyber Security services such as network administration and hardening against Cyber attacks. 
Our Host Based Security Systems (HBSS) Analysts configure, integrate, operate, and maintain Data Center environments by: 
• Performing system administration on the HBSS and integrate HBSS data 
• Monitoring the HBSS for alerts, assessing and modifying the HBSS operational parameters (filters, signatures, rules, etc) 
• Providing services supporting onsite security (HBSS, McAfee, Symantec) and authentication (Active Directory) 
BCSS also has experience performing system administration (Windows, UNIX, Linux, etc), including performance tuning, system availability, capacity planning, provisioning, security, STIGs, IAVAs, and IA compliance. We perform research and test configurations to determine the best solutions. BCSS maintains a Top Secret FCL.

tribes.capabilitiesNarrative:
Susitna helps clients develop solutions to their contaminated sites management challenges. Our team endeavors to achieve our client’s technical goals for remediation while helping them to protect human health and ecology, meet their regulatory obligations, control costs, and manage stakeholder expectations. Our team’s skill sets combine field services, regulatory negotiations, risk assessment, financial and project management, and remediation technology.
The Susitna team has over 30 years of combined experience in the Military Munitions Response Program (MMRP) for the DoD and private clients including comprehensive research investigation, remediation, and closure activities at sites in the lower-48 and in remote Alaska. Our munitions response professionals and scientists are proficient at performing Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act (CERCLA)-based investigations at sites impacted by current and historical military munitions activities.

BJCS provides individual, group, family therapy, case management, peer recovery support, psychosocial rehabilitation, and crisis-intervention services. BJCS is accredited through CARF International and the Oklahoma Department of Mental Health and Substance Abuse as an outpatient site for Mental Health and Substance Abuse Services. No matter how specialized their requirements, customers can rely on Tribal One to deliver multi-discipline, subject matter experts anywhere. Clients can count on Tribal One to support every aspect of a project’s lifecycle.
Customers seek out Tribal One for their Project/Program Management, Financial and Business Support, Administrative Support, Information Technology, Logistics and Quality Control needs.
Tribal One’s management approach simultaneously supports embedded onsite management and regional management and oversight at the IDIQ and Task Order levels; employs a structure designed to align with the customer’s organization and maintains quality control based on ISO 9001 standards. This agreement (operating under NAICS code 541620) brings together a top Alaska Native Regional Corporation (ANC) 8(a) certified firm and environmental and construction leader, Arcadis. The benefits of the Ahtna-Arcadis Mentor-Protégé and resulting joint ventures (AAJV) include the AAJV assumes Alaska Native Corporation 8(a) small, disadvantaged business status; it helps federal clients meet their contracting goals; past performance of both firms is represented collectively, as a prime contractor; and the resources from both parties are available to support the client’s needs. tribes.capabilitiesNarrative: Bgesh is a small business which provides professional and technical services across various industries. Since 2010, Bgesh has supported over 250 federal, DoD, and commercial clients. We've heavily focused our capability to support our clients’ missions. For us that means we emphasize our strong program management and recruiting teams which allow us to provide a wide range of services and solutions beyond those core capabilities to include financial management, information technology, cybersecurity, healthcare staffing, physical security consulting, and construction. Bgesh’s team of industry professionals includes accomplished Program, Project, and Technical Managers that have an average of 22 years industry experience. We are a financially stable small business whose centralized headquarters in San Antonio, Texas and regional operations nationwide, allow us to quickly mobilize resources to any project site and thereby serve our clients' mission requirements across all geographies.

tribes.capabilitiesNarrative: Established on 27 January 2021, Chenega Naswik International (CNI) is a wholly-owned, 8(a) small business of Chenega Corporation; an Alaska Native Corporation. The Alutiiq term, Naswik, means lookout and speaks to our global security operations supporting our nation's deployed defense systems around the world. We provide fire fighting, emergency management, security and protective services, and security and protective services training. CNI has strong financial resources providing customers with confidence and contract stability and plays a mission-critical role in the security of multiple domestic, international, and highly remote US Government sites. CNI's 8(a) status provides a sole source award capability and as a subsidiary of Chenega Corporation, we can accept DoD direct awards up to $100M, and non- DoD direct awards up to $22M without requiring Justification and Approval.

Network infrastructure generally consists of hardware such as routers, switches, servers, firewalls, load balancers, cabling and wireless access points that provide services such as DNS (domain name services), IDS(intrusion detection services), key management, certificate authority, VoIP, and network management applications. We specialize in system architecture, system deployment and solution integration, wired and wireless network infrastructure, cybersecurity, intrusion detection and prevention, information assurance, risk management framework, and network management application support services. tribes.capabilitiesNarrative: Ahtna Infrastructure & Technologies, LLC (AIT) is a wholly owned subsidiary of Ahtna Diversified Holdings, LLC, a holding company that is in turn wholly owned by its parent company, Ahtna, Inc., an Alaska Native Regional Corporation. We are a self-performing SBA 8(a) certified contractor that specializes in the execution of time sensitive, complex, and multifaceted construction, environmental, and engineering projects. With corporate and program offices coast-to-coast, AIT is positioned to support nationwide Government programs. AIT is headquartered in Anchorage, Alaska and has additional offices in CA, CO, HI, SC, and WA. AIT works for a wide variety of public and private-sector clients and maintains a multi-disciplinary staff with decades of experience who put an emphasis on safety. To this end, AIT has entered a mentor-protegee relationship with Unit Company, a high performing Alaska contractor, all to better serve our clients through enhanced capacity and experience.

tribes.capabilitiesNarrative: NVE is a Native Hawaiian Organization 8(a) owned entity with a management team and key personnel with extensive technical and management experience with the US Federal Government and DOD. NVE has an SBA approved existing MPA and JV Agreement with HHI Corp. NVE has bonding capacities of $10/$30 million. NVE has in house engineering (mechanical, structural, civil, electrical, chemical) services available and specializes in engineering, training, operations, construction and PM support. NVE has knowledge of the customer, technology, and community processes to provide best value solutions. NVE prides itself on integrity, respect, innovation, teamwork and quality with an excellent track record for completing projects on-time and on-budget.

tribes.capabilitiesNarrative: Kaliwohi offers IT and Software Engineering solutions with exceptional leadership and personable service. At our core we specialize in leading, developing, and delivering Technology Solutions with technology-based Staffing. We put our people and our customers first and pride ourselves on the technical expertise we bring to the table. Offering highly technical reach back support with Sr. Programmers, Oracle and SQL Database Administrators, Sr. Software Systems Engineers, and Data Architects ready to support our customers. Our market focus is the Federal Government with emphasis on the DoD and nation-wide coverage. Our lean and efficient corporate structure gives us the flexibility to react and respond to clients’ needs with immediate real time solutions and results that larger businesses simply can’t offer, while at the same time maximizing cost effectiveness.
